phrases.phrase: 백년을 다 살아야 삼만 육천 일

meanings: A living (person's) mouth would not be cobwebbed , Everyday brings its bread with it

meanings.meaning: Every tub must stand on its own bottom.
Every tub must stand on its own bottom.

vlive.korean: [한 명씩 유인하는 뷔] - 태형아 넌 살아야 해 - 태형아 펀치! 그렇지! [V luring them one by one] - V, you should survive. - V, punch! Yes! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.108
vlive.english: [V luring them one by one] - V, you should survive. - V, punch! Yes!

vlive.korean: 꼭 열정적으로 살아야 할까요? Do we have to live a passionate life? 듣기 View video BTS : 슙디의 꿀 FM 06.13
vlive.english: Do we have to live a passionate life?

vlive.korean: 매 순간 불태우면서 살아야 할까요? Do we have to live an intense moment? 듣기 View video BTS : 슙디의 꿀 FM 06.13
vlive.english: Do we have to live an intense moment?

vlive.korean: 평생 이러고 살아야 되나? Do I have to live the rest of my life like this? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 오늘은 뭐할까요??
vlive.english: Do I have to live the rest of my life like this?

vlive.korean: 하지만 살아야 돼 마치 수백 나무? But we have to live like, hundreds plants? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 쏟아지는 돼끼🐷🐰
vlive.english: But we have to live like, hundreds plants?

examples.korean: I’ve always believed in living life to the full. 발음듣기 나는 늘 인생을 최대한 열심히 살아야 한다고 믿어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve always believed in living life to the full. 발음

examples.korean: She believes in living life to the max. 발음듣기 그녀는 삶을 최대한도로 (열심히) 살아야 한다고 믿는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She believes in living life to the max. 발음

examples.korean: After his wife died, he had nothing to live for. 발음듣기 그는 아내가 죽은 후 살아야 할 이유가 아무것도 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After his wife died, he had nothing to live for. 발음

examples.korean: Some college students will have to live out. 발음듣기 일부 대학생들은 캠퍼스[기숙사] 밖에서 살아야 할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some college students will have to live out. 발음

examples.korean: He has three more years in prison before he’s served out his sentence. 발음듣기 그는 형기를 다 채우려면 3년 더 징역을 살아야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has three more years in prison before he’s served out his sentence. 발음
